googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jerry Cox
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I contacted five separate plumbers to replace a tank-less water heater.  Two provided me with completely outrageous quotes.  One never provided me with a quote as he promised twice.  One gave me a reasonable quote but never showed up.  After another Google search I found Pike Plumbing about 25 miles from where I live.  Pike's office staff was very professional giving me a reasonable quote over the phone and scheduled a next day service call.  Kris and Chandler arrived on time and immediately began removing the old heater.  It was obvious that they knew what they were doing.  The task was handled quickly and has worked flawlessly for several weeks.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: A K
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Kris is extremely professional, knowledgeable, courteous, kind, timely and respectful.
I hired Roto Rooter of Arab and was totally ripped off and the guy threw his cigarettes all around my house.
But thank God for Kris and Pikes Plumbing!!!
They came to my rescue and I highly recommend Kris for his qualifications and kindness and Pikes Plumbibg for all your Plumbing needs!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Alicia Howard
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very efficient and affordable. I was able to get same day service which is often difficult. Staff was professional and kind. I recommend their services for business and personal use!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Anna Marie James
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Pikes Plumbing & Gas is a excellent company. I have used them many times to pump my sewer, jet wash the sewer lines under my house and for plumbing issues over the years. Yesterday March 1, 2022 Jacob & Chandler came an installed a new kitchen faucet (after removing the old one that broke in pieces. They replaced all the polybutylene lines under my sink and installed shut off valves on each line. They installed a new undercounter water filter system and reconnected my dish washer line. These guys did an excellent job and really care about doing an excellent job for the customer. They do things the correct way. (I once had a Heat & Air & plumbing company so I should know) I would also like to say that another Pikes' employee came to my home on an after hours call & fixed a leak under my house and his name is Kris and he to is excellent as were all the guys that came over the years. This company does things right! I am a customer & am not related to any owners or employees of this business! I did this review because of the excellent work they have done for me all these years!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for your review! Our guys do try to provide excellent service and we appreciate customers who take the time to recognize them for that! We hope to hear from you the next time you need our assistance :)
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Susette Davis
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very friendly and professional. Helped us with a late night problem.  Provided excellent service and good quality replacements. Very satisfied with the repair. Found ourselves a reliable plumber for the future.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: So glad that you were happy with our service and we hope to hear from you again!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: R&J
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Jenny in the office is so sweet and understanding best secretary ever!!!!she sent a crew out immediately to help us they got here within the hour best service we've ever had nice,professional,understanding,ill call them again if I need them and know one else.Awesome Crew all around!!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for your kind review! We do appreciate our customers and hope you have the best experience with us!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: jerry elrod
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: The service technicians came and repaired a pinhole in a piece of pex line and installed a new pressure regulator they did a good job but the price was more than triple what it should have costed it was a $350 job and they charged $1095 this job was for my mother she is a senior citizen on a fixed income I'm very disappointed in the price they charged for minimal work performed
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Christopher Mahan
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: This is a great, honest, business with exceptional service.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

We could not be more pleased with the service we received from Pike's Plumbing.  Josh was professional, courteous and very kind.  The work was done exactly as it should have been.  On time and very nicely.  We were so happy to have Josh and his helpers at our home. We highly recommend Pike's Plumbing.

Charles and Florence Parker

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Sally Bryan
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Chris was very professional. His work was superior and he was a great communicator on all aspects of the plumbing problems. We are so pleased with his knowledge and dealing with our " old plumbing." We will tell all our friends about this company!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

Wow! What can I say about Pikes Plumming, these Guys came in assessed my problem got straight to work. I was pleasantly surprised when my cost was cheaper than I expected!
I would most definitely recommend Pikes Plumbing and gas to anyone and everyone that has a plumbing problem!

Thanks Pike Plumbing!

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Dedra Puckett
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Best guys out there. I will never call anyone else! I have had dealings with 2 other local plumbers in the Marshall county area within the last year. I have been way over charged, and the job wasn't done right. I have paid over $20,000 to get so plumbing issue resolved (sewage issues). This last time, and final time, I chose to call Pikes Plumbing, and have had no issues since. I will never call anyone else. I have called them back today for another problem, regarding a sink, in the restroom and once again they didn't let me down! Hands down best in the business!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Marie Boatwright
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I have had many encounters with Mr. Tim Pike and have always been satisfied. He has always charged a fair price. Unlike many other plumbers he has always left the site cleaner than he found it. You can not go wrong with Pikes Plumbing!! Great group of honest working men.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: C Nosv
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Lessons learned - Ask for referrals -  Get free estimates. This company charged $189 to assess the area, incorrectly I might add. We were told if we continued to use them the $189 would come off the total price. When we called back they hem hawed about the $189, maybe part of it would be credited, additional charges of $250 to open the septic tank and $395 to pump the septic tank. We finally got a referral & called another company, they charged $375 - period! $375 for looking at it, opening, pumping, cleaning it!
1 trip/1 price     $834 vs $375.
My referral - call Bailey Environmental Services in Cleveland, AL
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Hi C Nosv, I was looking over our reviews and I'm here to inform you that Pikes Plumbing does not pump septic tanks, we are a plumbing company. We would like to have this resolved so if you could please reach out to us at pikesplumbing@aol.com.
Thanks.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Pike's Plumbing & Gas
